action.action-desc: Ms. Cortez Masto (for herself, Mr. Risch, and Ms. Lummis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that income received by a regulated investment company from precious metals shall be treated as qualifying income.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Precious Metals Parity Act.

section.header: Treatment of income received by regulated investment companies from precious metals
